QueryResult.text: SELECT L.ID, L.LOOKUP_TYPE, L.LOOKUP_CODE AS IDEA_PRJ_CATEGORY_KEY, L.PARENT_LOOKUP_CODE, L.LOOKUP_LEVEL, L.LOOKUP_ENUM, CASE WHEN L.SORT_ORDER is null THEN 0 ELSE L.SORT_ORDER END AS SORT_ORDER, L.IS_SYSTEM, L.IS_ACTIVE, L.IS_ADMIN_VISIBLE, L.IS_UPGRADE_PROTECTED, L.PARTITION_CODE, L.PARTITION_MODE_CODE, L.CREATED_DATE, L.CREATED_BY, CASE WHEN L.LAST_UPDATED_DATE > NLS.LAST_UPDATED_DATE THEN L.LAST_UPDATED_DATE ELSE NLS.LAST_UPDATED_DATE END AS LAST_UPDATED_DATE, L.LAST_UPDATED_BY, NLS.LANGUAGE_CODE, LANG.ID AS LANGUAGE_ID, NLS.NAME AS IDEA_PRJ_CATEGORY, NLS.DESCRIPTION FROM CMN_CAPTIONS_NLS NLS, CMN_LOOKUPS L, CMN_LANGUAGES LANG WHERE L.LOOKUP_TYPE = 'OBJ_IDEA_PROJECT_CATEGORY' AND NLS.TABLE_NAME = 'CMN_LOOKUPS' AND NLS.PK_ID = L.ID AND NLS.LANGUAGE_CODE = LANG.LANGUAGE_CODE AND LANG.IS_DW_ENABLED = 1
